ADS.Text1: The game starts off with Mono waking up in a forest by a TV. This is the Wilderness, and it's a truly terrifying place to be.
ADS.Text2: Head right until you reach a small gap. Jump across it, and continue forward until you reach a big tree.
ADS.Text3: Head up to the small vent at the base of it, lift it up, and head inside.
ADS.Text4: This will take you to the opposite side of the tree, where you’ll see a bag filled with bodies hanging from a separate tree.
ADS.Text5: Keep moving forward. Once you’ve jumped off the log, you’ll come across a tripwire on the ground.
ADS.Text6: Jump over it, or you can sneak around the sides of it. You’ll then come across a box standing up.
ADS.Text7: In order to reach the next cliff, you’ll have to push it to the base of it then climb up.
ADS.Text8: Rate Us 5 Stars And Download Little Nightmares 2 and enjoy
